description:
In his first film, Jacob hinted that he wanted to do more. In fact, he came right out and said it. He wanted to do sex.
At the time, I didn't press whether he meant he wanted to be with a girl or a boy.
So a few days later I asked him.
"Doesn't matter," he said.
Well, that made me really curious. It's usually not that easy.
"You're not interested in pussy?" I asked.
"No, I am," he said.
What he said next really surprised me.
"I get plenty of pussy on my route."
I always thought that was just a "Sex in the City" cliche. But I guess not.
"You mean you have sex with the women on your delivery route?"
"Yeah, office chicks are always really horny," he replied.
Playing along, I said, "And they like the uniform?"
"Exactly."
"Ever had sex with a dude on your route?" I asked.
"No," he said. "But plenty of opportunities."
Jurek, on the other hand, has had sex with dudes. And he's really starting to like it. A lot.
title: Jacob & Jurek
